title: Unable to install truffle on Mac Big sur
body:
npm install -g truffle

npm WARN deprecated testrpc@0.0.1: testrpc has been renamed to ganache-cli, please use this package from now on.

npm WARN deprecated mkdirp-promise@5.0.1: This package is broken and no longer maintained. 'mkdirp' itself supports promises now, please switch to that.

npm WARN deprecated urix@0.1.0: Please see https://github.com/lydell/urix#deprecated

npm WARN deprecated har-validator@5.1.5: this library is no longer supported

npm WARN deprecated fsevents@2.1.3: "Please update to latest v2.3 or v2.2"

npm WARN deprecated resolve-url@0.2.1: https://github.com/lydell/resolve-url#deprecated

npm WARN deprecated apollo-tracing@0.15.0: The apollo-tracing package is no longer part of Apollo Server 3. See https://www.apollographql.com/docs/apollo-server/migration/#tracing for details

npm WARN deprecated ipld-raw@6.0.0: This module has been superseded by the multiformats module

npm WARN deprecated querystring@0.2.1: The querystring API is considered Legacy. new code should use the URLSearchParams API instead.

npm WARN deprecated circular-json@0.5.9: CircularJSON is in maintenance only, flatted is its successor.

npm WARN deprecated graphql-tools@6.2.6: This package has been deprecated and now it only exports makeExecutableSchema.\nAnd it will no longer receive updates.\nWe recommend you to migrate to scoped packages such as @graphql-tools/schema, @graphql-tools/utils and etc.\nCheck out https://www.graphql-tools.com to learn what package you should use instead

npm WARN deprecated graphql-extensions@0.15.0: The graphql-extensions API has been removed from Apollo Server 3. Use the plugin API instead: https://www.apollographql.com/docs/apollo-server/integrations/plugins/

npm WARN deprecated cids@1.1.9: This module has been superseded by the multiformats module

npm WARN deprecated redux-devtools-instrument@1.10.0: Package moved to @redux-devtools/instrument.

npm WARN deprecated redux-devtools-core@0.2.1: Package moved to @redux-devtools/app.

npm WARN deprecated @nodefactory/filsnap-adapter@0.2.2: Package is deprecated in favour of @chainsafe/filsnap-adapter

npm WARN deprecated ipld-dag-cbor@0.17.1: This module has been superseded by @ipld/dag-cbor and multiformats

npm WARN deprecated uuid@3.4.0: Please upgrade to version 7 or higher. Older versions may use Math.random() in certain circumstances, which is known to be problematic. See https://v8.dev/blog/math-random for details.

Older versions may use Math.random() in certain circumstances, which is known to be problematic. See https://v8.dev/blog/math-random for details.

(https://github.com/visionmedia/debug/issues/797) npm WARN deprecated multicodec@0.5.7: This module has been superseded by the multiformats module

changed 2177 packages, and audited 2273 packages in 4m

133 packages are looking for funding run npm fund for details

**80 vulnerabilities (7 low, 50 moderate, 16 high, 7 critical)**

To address issues that do not require attention, run: npm audit fix

To address all issues possible, run: npm audit fix --force

Some issues need review, and may require choosing a different dependency.

Run npm audit for details.

Can you share the environment versions of the machine? 

* Operating System: 
* Ethereum client:
* Truffle version (`truffle version`):
* node version (`node --version`):
* npm version (`npm --version`): 

Thanks
I think @maheshmobile  has installed it successfully.
Yes, I agree with @ken-wong. npm just generates a lot of warnings.
me too . Can you solve this problem?

FYI

node --version

v14.15.1


npm --version

8.1.4



truffle version

Truffle v5.4.23 (core: 5.4.23)

Solidity v0.5.16 (solc-js)

Node v14.15.1

Web3.js v1.5.3


Mac os Big Sur 11.6




On Thu, Dec 9, 2021 at 3:40 PM cds-amal ***@***.***> wrote:

> Can you share the environment versions of the machine?
>
>    - Operating System:
>    - Ethereum client:
>    - Truffle version (truffle version):

Mahesh

> Truffle v5.4.23 (core: 5.4.23) 
> Solidity v0.5.16 (solc-js) 
> Node v14.15.1 
> Web3.js v1.5.3

The above output indicates Truffle installed, even though npm generated many warnings.

But it thrown following issues

These are warnings and do not affect installation.
Hey @maheshmobile, we're going to close this as it's a bit misleading given Truffle does actually install. We're also addressing the NPM warnings in #3986. Any other queries, just let us know.
